mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate= NOW(), `body`= #{body}, memberId = #{memberId}, boardId = #{boardId}, relTypeCode = 'comment', relId = #{relId}, goodReactionPoint = 0, badReactionPoint = 0
mapper.select: SELECT comment.*, IFNULL(SUM(reactionPoint.point),0) AS extra__sumReactionPoint, IFNULL(SUM(IF(reactionPoint.point > 0,reactionPoint.point,0)),0) AS extra__goodReactionPoint, IFNULL(SUM(IF(reactionPoint.point < 0,reactionPoint.point,0)),0) AS extra__badReactionPoint, member.name AS 'name' FROM comment INNER JOIN `member` ON comment.memberId = member.id LEFT JOIN reactionPoint ON comment.id = reactionPoint.relId AND reactionPoint.relTypeCode = 'comment' WHERE comment.id = #{id}
SELECT comment.*, member.name FROM `comment` INNER JOIN `member` ON comment.memberId = member.id ORDER BY comment.id DESC
